Package battle

Class BattleManager

java.lang.Object
battle.BattleManager
public class BattleManager extends Object
A class for managing all the battles and functionality of battles which a player can participate in.
Version:
1.1, Apr 2022.
Author:
Jackie Jone

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleManager

      public BattleManager(Player player, Difficulty difficulty, int maxDays)
      Constructor to for BattleManager, creates a new BattleManager for a given player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player which the BattleManager is for.
      difficulty - Difficulty of the game
      maxDays - Maximum number of days the player can select

  • Method Details

    • generateTeam

      public Team generateTeam(int currentDay, int maxDays, Difficulty difficulty)
      Generates a team of monsters.
      Parameters:
      currentDay - The current day in the game.
      maxDays - The maximum number of days in the game.
      difficulty - The difficulty of the game.
      Returns:
      A Team containing monsters.

    • generateOpponents

      public void generateOpponents(int currentDay, int maxDays, Difficulty difficulty)
      Generates the different opponent which the player can battle against.
      Parameters:
      currentDay - The current day of the game.
      maxDays - The maximum number of days any game can last.
      difficulty - The difficulty of the current game.

    • getOpponents

      public ArrayList<Player> getOpponents()
      Gets the opponents which the player can face against.
      Returns:
      A list of Opponents that the player can face against.

    • setOpponent

      public void setOpponent(Player opponent)
      Sets the opponent which the player is battling against
      Parameters:
      opponent - The selected opponent to battle against

    • giveRewards

      public void giveRewards()
      Distributes rewards to the player if the player has defeated the opponent.

    • simulateBattle

      public void simulateBattle()
      Simulates the battle and sets the eventLog of the battleManager with the events that occurred during the battle.

    • nextEvent

      public BattleEvent nextEvent()
      Gets the next event in the event log.
      Returns:
      Next available event in the event log or null if there is no event.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Gets the player in the BattleManager.
      Returns:
      the active player.

    • getCurrOpponent

      public Player getCurrOpponent()
      Gets the current opponent in the BattleManager.
      Returns:
      the current selected opponent.

    • getResult

      public BattleResult getResult()
      Gets the result of a battle after the battle has been simulated
      Returns:
      Enumeration value defining whether the player has won or lost.
